title: Echoes of Halden
outcome: A wave of mysterious messages, apparently sent from Halden's secure terminal, floods official and public channels. As factions try to claim or deny his legacy, citizens are swept into a battle of narratives—some cling to hopeful 'Halden Echoes' while others spiral into paranoia.

events.description: A mysterious audio message allegedly from Halden plays on citywide screens, urging citizens to "remember the truth behind the score." Factions scramble to respond.
Halden 'echoes'—encrypted notes with conflicting instructions—circulate on official systems and social feeds. Some seem to criticize the Directorate; others praise Council reforms.
Citizens begin mass sharing and debating the 'authenticity' of Halden's messages. Unease grows as more people question what is real, sparking late-night gatherings and secret broadcasts.
Directorate and Innovator factions accuse each other of manipulating the echo campaign, launching competing investigations and purges in their ranks.
A citywide poll shows declining trust in all Council factions as rumors swirl about Halden’s last directives—but no faction is able to suppress the ongoing echo wave.
